attributes.action: Designate Remembrance Day as a Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To bring us in to line with the rest of Europe, where respect is paid to those who have sacrificed their lives in the service of their country.  This may also remind the younger generation of the heroism shown and the honour due, to their elders....there are few role models for young people these days and discussion of these matters may educate them in moral values, and true courage...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
